issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Cannot de-register a CC and re-register it with a different name

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
I cannot re-register a CC using a different component name. See the sequence below:

{code}
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component cc-192.168.51.78
RESPONSE true

Trying rsync to sync keys with 192.168.51.78
done
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_124         	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.124:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_124/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_125         	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.125:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_125/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_126         	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.126:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_126/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_127         	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_127/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.92  	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.92/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_91          	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_91/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_92          	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_92/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Dns  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_124         	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.124:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_124/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_125         	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.125:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_125/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_126         	DISABLED  	766 	http://192.168.51.126:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_126/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_127         	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI02        	cc-192.168.51.78	ENABLED   	766 	http://192.168.51.78:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI02:cluster:cc-192.168.51.78/
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --deregister-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component cc-192.168.51.78
RESPONSE true
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_124         	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.124:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_124/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_125         	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.125:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_125/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_126         	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.126:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_126/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_127         	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_127/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.92  	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.92/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_91          	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_91/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_92          	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_92/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Dns  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_124         	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.124:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_124/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_125         	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.125:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_125/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_126         	DISABLED  	767 	http://192.168.51.126:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_126/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_127         	ENABLED   	767 	http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_127/
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_78
RESPONSE true

Trying rsync to sync keys with 192.168.51.78
done
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_124         	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.124:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_124/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_125         	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.125:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_125/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_126         	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.126:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_126/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI01        	SC_127         	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_127/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.92  	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.92/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_91          	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_91/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_92          	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.92:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_92/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.91  	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.91:8773/services/Dns  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.91/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_124         	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.124:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_124/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_125         	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.125:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_125/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_126         	DISABLED  	769 	http://192.168.51.126:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_126/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI01        	CC_127         	ENABLED   	769 	http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI02        	CC_78          	NOTREADY  	769 	http://192.168.51.78:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI02:cluster:CC_78/
[root@eucahost-51-91 ~]# 
{code}

The only way out of this situation is to cleanrestart the CC.

I reproduced this issue on the centos6 setup using the following sequence:

{code}
/usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_78
/usr/sbin/euca_conf --deregister-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_78
/usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_78

--> At this point, the CC came back up in ENABLED state

/usr/sbin/euca_conf --deregister-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_78
/usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cluster --partition PARTI02 --host 192.168.51.78 --component CC_7812234

--> At this point the CC came up in NOTREADY state. Had to cleanrestart CC services
{code}
fields.summary: Cannot de-register a CC and re-register it with a different name
fields.environment: CENTOS 6 - Multicluster HA KVM with NetApp SAN

comments.body: At this point I do not know if this affects 3.0.x.
